files.{{PROJECT_NAME}}/Views/MainWindow.xaml:
<Window x:Class="{{NAMESPACE}}.Views.MainWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:vm="clr-namespace:{{NAMESPACE}}.ViewModels"
        Title="{{PROJECT_NAME}}" Height="450" Width="800">
    <Window.DataContext>
        <vm:MainViewModel/>
    </Window.DataContext>
    
    <Grid Margin="20">
        <Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="*"/>
        </Grid.RowDefinitions>
        
        <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Text="{{PROJECT_NAME}}" FontSize="24" FontWeight="Bold" Margin="0,0,0,20"/>
        
        <StackPanel Grid.Row="1" Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0,0,0,20">
            <TextBlock Text="Counter: " VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,10,0"/>
            <TextBlock Text="{Binding Counter}" VerticalAlignment="Center" FontWeight="Bold"/>
            <Button Content="Increment" Command="{Binding IncrementCommand}" Margin="20,0,0,0" Padding="10,5"/>
        </StackPanel>
        
        <TextBlock Grid.Row="2" Text="{{DESCRIPTION}}" TextWrapping="Wrap"/>
    </Grid>
</Window>

# {{PROJECT_NAME}}

{{DESCRIPTION}}

## Requirements

- .NET 8.0 SDK
- Visual Studio 2022 or Rider

## Build

```bash
dotnet restore
dotnet build
```

## Run

```bash
dotnet run --project {{PROJECT_NAME}}
```

## Architecture

- MVVM pattern with CommunityToolkit.Mvvm
- ViewModels in ViewModels/
- Views in Views/
- Models in Models/
- Services in Services/
